message: Let's divide fairly, I get a bit more
Your share is decreasing faster than mine, let's be realistic and split a bit more evenly this time.
I'll take a smaller share than before, but I still think I deserve the bigger part
We're running out of time, Alice.  This is a good deal for both of us considering the shrinking pot.
I'll meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I can get a bit more
Let's stop wasting time, Alice. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at everything.
